comment: Great Professor! I loved this class!!!!

if you don't like to read-don't take her! 5 books are required for this class and you will read every single one of them-entirely. she gives detailed reading quizzes every single class to make sure you did the reading. she makes this class a lot harder than it needs to be. class discussions are pretty interesting. work hard if you want a good grade
Ms. Turner makes this class incredibly difficult. She assigns long readings with very difficult quizzes every week. While it is obvious she is very intelligent and knows her stuff, I would avoid her.

She makes the class harder than it has to be. The class is titled love and sex it's kind of misleading because you are not really talking about what you think you will be talking about. The class is interesting but there is a lot of reading and her tests are NOT multiple choice if you can find another teacher I would recommend taking someone else.
